title: Climate change protestors disrupt Heathrow
text:
Climate change protestors disrupt Heathrow 13 July 2015 Save 
Passengers using Heathrow are facing delays and cancellations after activists from the Plane Stupid managed to get onto one of the airport’s runways. 
According to the BBC , around 12 members of the group cut through a fence and made their way to the northern runway at 3.30am this morning. 
The runway was closed until 6.20am but has now reopened. 
Heathrow said in a statement on its website: “Due to protest activity at the airport, there may be delays and cancellations and you are advised to check your flight status below before travelling to the airport. 
“We are sorry for the disruption and our priority remains to ensure the safe running of the airport.” 
Plane Stupid’s Twitter feed shows pictures of police cutting through locks chaining protestors to a fence.
